LanguageData.Dynamic.stages.0.label: dynamic thought
LanguageData.MayorNoBedroom.stages.0.label: no mayoral bedroom
LanguageData.MayorNoBedroom.stages.0.description: I had to schedule a meeting with a constituent at a gathering spot. I need a bedroom so I can conduct these meetings in private.
LanguageData.WonElection.stages.0.label: won an election
LanguageData.WonElection.stages.0.description: I did it! I'm the mayor now! I'm so thankful to everyone who voted for me.
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeEnemy.stages.0.label: adrenaline rush
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeEnemy.stages.0.descriptio: I killed someone attacking our colony. My hands are still shaking... I can't believe I survived.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSoldBleedingHeart.stages.0.d: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. I can't believe we participate in that barbarism.
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvestedBleedingHeart.sta: The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's unacceptable, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
Someone took body parts from a colonist. It's unacceptable, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.ReplacedPartBleedingHeart.stages.0.label: installed an organ or body part
LanguageData.ReplacedPartBleedingHeart.stages.0.descr: I gave someone a new organ or body part. I probably improved their quality of life! I'm so happy.
LanguageData.DoctorBleedingHeart.stages.0.label: helped a patient
LanguageData.DoctorBleedingHeart.stages.0.description: I love medicine. It gives you so many opportunities to help people.
LanguageData.RescuedBleedingHeart.stages.0.label: saved someone
LanguageData.RescuedBleedingHeart.stages.0.descriptio: I rescued someone from near-death. No need to thank me, good deeds are their own reward.
LanguageData.CookedMealBleedingHeart.stages.0.label: cooked a meal
LanguageData.CookedMealBleedingHeart.stages.0.descrip: I love cooking, I feel like I'm helping people. I'm keeping this colony alive!
LanguageData.FilledGraveBleedingHeart.stages.0.label: buried someone
LanguageData.KilledPatientBleedingHeart.stages.0.desc: I killed one of my patients in surgery. It's all my fault... they should still be alive.
LanguageData.RecentlyDesensitized.stages.0.label: desensitized to violence
LanguageData.RecentlyDesensitized.stages.0.descriptio: I witnessed death, and felt nothing. How depressing...
LanguageData.DreamGood.stages.0.label: had a good dream
LanguageData.DreamGood.stages.0.description: That was a nice dream. It gave me hope.
LanguageData.DreamBad.stages.0.label: had a bad dream
LanguageData.DreamBad.stages.0.description: That was an unpleasant dream. It's still bothering me.
LanguageData.DreamNightmare.stages.0.label: had a nightmare
LanguageData.DreamNightmare.stages.0.description: Gah! What a terrible dream. I'm depressed just thinking about it.
LanguageData.TreatmentFailed.stages.0.label: {0} treatment failed
LanguageData.TreatmentFailed.stages.0.description: The doctor failed to treat my mental illness... it just felt like he didn't understand me.
LanguageData.SuccessfulPlot.stages.0.label: fell plot succeeded
LanguageData.SuccessfulPlot.stages.0.description: I destroyed the plague on this place. We are safe now.
LanguageData.HeardParanoia.stages.0.label: exposed to paranoid rambling
LanguageData.HeardParanoia.stages.0.description: The things I heard... they can't be true. Can they?
We just left someone behind. I can't stop thinking about what might happen to them.
LanguageData.ColonistAbandonedToDieBleedingHeart.stag: We left someone behind in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive. How could we?
LanguageData.PrisonerAbandonedToDieBleedingHeart.stag: We left a prisoner behind in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive. We have a responsibility to safeguard the people we imprison.
LanguageData.DateCancelled.stages.0.label: had to cancel a date
LanguageData.DateCancelled.stages.0.description: I was supposed to go on a date with my partner, but something came up in the colony and we had to cancel. I was looking forward to it...
